data.description: Connect to an RFC1179 line printer daemon
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is similar to Net::Printer in that it connects directly
    to a BSD-style line printer daemon. But there the similarity ends.
    Net::LPR allows essentially any action or feature that is not
    expressly forbidden in RFC1179. There is no CPAN module that
    currently has this built-in flexibility (otherwise I'd be using it,
    believe me!!!).
